review: I purchased the Fire stick specifically to stream sling tv, however it does not do a very good job.  Continuously lags and that's if i'm able to stream at all.  This is on a 50 mb connection as well.  My Roku 3 has no issues at all with Sling.  Going to just get another Roku to replace the Fire stick.  I would avoid if purchasing for sling tv use.

review: Love this for my television in my kitchen that had no way for me to watch Netflix.  Now I can!  Makes me very happy to be able to watch while working in my kitchen now.  Setup was quite easy.  The only thing I didn't realize was that the stick needs to also be plugged into the wall.  Not a huge deal, I just wasn't expecting to have another cord to deal with.
